title: The Host of an Ancient Spirit - Novel Updates
author: QingShan   青衫
description: Chen Feng, a young genius, was demoted and suffers all kinds of humiliation and set-backs. One day, he finds a secret pagoda and learns a supreme cultivation skill, which launches his new, invincible life. Beautiful girls throw themselves at him, powerful enemies are afraid of him... all because he has just become the ruler of this realm.>
